import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Head from 'next/head'; import {loadFirebase} from '../lib/db.js' export default class Index extends React.Component{ componentDidMount(){ const script = document.createElement("script"); script.src = "/assets/js/core/sort.js"; script.async = true; document.body.appendChild(script); } static async getInitialProps() { let firebase = await loadFirebase() let result = await new Promise((resolve, reject) => { firebase.firestore().collection('employer') .limit(10) .get() .then(snapshot => { let data = [] snapshot.forEach((doc) => { data.push( Object.assign({ id: doc.id }, doc.data()) ) }) console.log("Hello") console.log(data) resolve(data) }) .catch(error => { reject([]) }) }) console.log(result) return {employer: result} } render(){ const employer= this.props.employer return ( Golden Snitch | Admin
